about_the_game:
"VR Life Safety" is an innovative VR game that immerses players in realistic emergency scenarios in a school environment. Players take on the role of a life safety teacher who must lead the evacuation and ensure the safety of students in the event of an emergency.

Game Features:


  • School Scenarios: Practice what to do in case of fire, earthquake, chemical accident and other potential hazards in a school setting.
  • Immersive Gameplay: Use VR technology to create a sense of real presence in the school and interaction with students and staff.
  • Skill Development: Learn the basics of safety and correct actions in emergency situations, which can be useful in real life.
  • Impact of Decisions: Every decision you make affects the safety and lives of students. The game tracks and demonstrates the consequences of your actions.

Player Experience:

"VR Life Safety: School Protocol" offers not only exciting gameplay, but also an educational aspect, allowing players to better understand the importance of correct actions in emergency situations. With this game you will not only have fun, but also be able to prepare for real challenges that may arise in school life. Are you ready to become a real hero in the classroom?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit) или выше
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, HTC Vive, Valve Index

  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit) или выше
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent

  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2060 or equivalent
